data.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
data.author: Anaïs Nin

data.quote: Life is a process. We are a process. The universe is a process.
data.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

data.quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you’re going to live your life.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.r
data.author: Bennett

data.quote: Don’t downgrade your dream just to fit your reality. Upgrade your conviction to match your destiny
data.author: Kevin Smith

data.quote: At the age of 18, I made up my mind to never have another bad day in my life. I dove into a endless sea of gratitude from which I've never emerged.
data.author: John Assaraf

data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: You were put on this Earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
data.author: Steve Maraboli

data.quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Don’t let your fear decide your future..
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Every next level of your life will demand a different version of you.
data.author: Anthony Saleh

data.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
data.author: E.E. Cummings

data.quote: Make the most of yourself….for that is all there is of you.
data.author: nRalph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: You have to fight through some bad days to earn the best days of your life
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Don’t think about what might go wrong. Think about what might go right.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Strength is the product of struggle. You must do what others don’t to achieve what others wont.
data.author: Henry Rollins

data.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
data.author: Charles R. Swindoll

data.quote: The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
data.author: William James

data.quote: ServiceIf you get tired, learn to rest, not quit.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
